****************************************
cuda-bindings: Low-level CUDA interfaces
****************************************

   :target: https://www.nvidia.com/
   :alt: NVIDIA

`cuda.bindings `_ is a standard set of low-level interfaces, providing full coverage of and 1:1 access to the CUDA host APIs from Python. Checkout the `Overview `_ for the workflow and performance results.

* `Repository `_
* `Documentation `_
* `Examples `_
* `Issue tracker `_

For the installation instruction, please refer to the `Installation `_ page.

usage_description: This library is used to provide direct access to CUDA's host APIs from Python, offering a 1:1 interface for seamless integration of GPU-accelerated computations into Python applications. Developers can leverage this library to unlock the full potential of NVIDIA GPUs and offload computationally intensive tasks from their CPU to achieve significant performance boosts.
